alert.note: Alert for Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 9:13PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Kiowa and northern Bent Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 913 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Haswell, or 31 miles northeast of North La Junta, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Haswell around 920 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
